name: IsoMetro
description:
This game is inspired by SimCity 3000 and I've specifically limited myself to using only a 2D rendering system to focus on game mechanics instead of graphics features.

Downloading the project is free during development, but once the game mechanics are implemented I may set a price along with a large content update.

While I'm excited to add actual playable mechanics and content, I'm carefully building this game on a solid foundation. For example you can pan around the world effectively infinitely (unless you wait long enough to wrap around an entire 32 bit integer for either axis) instead of being restricted to a small playable area. However for the moment, as far as features go there is not even a UI system.

- Use Alt+F4 to exit.

- Press R to select the road tool, then click and drag.

- Press B for the bulldoze tool, then click and drag.

- You can interrupt tool dragging interactions or entirely deselect the tool by pressing Escape.

Source code not currently public, it may be released later.

Asset Exporter tool can be used to with your own scripts to create custom buildings in case you want to create content: https://glassblade.itch.io/isometro-exporter
